DOC.brief_summary: To investigate pleiotropic effect ticagrelor addition antiplatelet effect type 2 diabetic patient non-ST elevation acute coronary syndrome measure inflammatory marker , circulate number endothelial progenitor cell , brachial artery endothelial function , arterial stiffness .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Ticagrelor vs. Prasugrel Inflammation , Arterial Stiffness , Endothelial Function , Circulating Endothelial Progenitor Cells Diabetic Patients With Non-ST Elevation Acute Coronary Syndrome ( NSTE-ACS ) Requiring Coronary Stenting
DOC.criteria: 1 . Provision inform consent prior study specific procedures 2 . Newly diagnose type 2 diabetic patient type 2 diabetic patient hypoglycemic agent age 30 70 3 . NonST elevation Acute coronary syndrome successful coronary stent implantation ( TIMI flow grade 3 procedure ) 1 . Hypersensitivity ticagrelor , prasugrel excipients 2 . No prior use either ticagrelor prasugrel within month prior randomization . 3 . History intracranial bleeding time 4 . Active pathologic bleed 5 . Hemoglobin A1c > 9 % 6 . Type 1 diabetes 7 . Decreased serum platelet level ( < 100,000/uL ) 8 . Need chronic oral anticoagulant therapy chronic lowmolecularweight heparin 9 . Gastrointestinal bleed within past 6 month , major surgery within 30 day 10 . Renal failure require dialysis anticipate need dialysis course study 11 . Any condition opinion investigator would make unsafe unsuitable patient participate study 12 . Involvement plan and/or conduct study 13 . Left ventricular ejection fraction < 40 % 14 . Hepatic dysfunction ( aspartate aminotransferase alanine aminotransferase > twice upper limit ) 15 . Gastrointestinal disorder Crohn ` disease 16 . Alcohol abuse 17 . Steroid hormone replacement therapy 18 . Serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dL . 19 . Prior history CVA stroke 20 . Body weight < 60 kg 21 . Life expectancy less year 22 . Known pregnancy , breastfeeding , intend become pregnant study period
